#Besides changing the "no" to a "yes", please do not edit this file
#as it can effect the startup of autoScript.

autoScript is an open source programs, to use it you must agree to
the following conditions...

I will not use autoScript to display, transmit or distribute any
content that infringes any trademark, trade secret, copyright, or
other propietary or intellectual property rights of any person.

I will not use autoScript to scan, DDOS, or in any way interfere
with any computer system without the owners written permission.

-Do you agree with the above conditions (yes/no): no
